mnd14:7.10: tassa → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3 potthakesu

mnd14:45.4: attā → attaṃ (s1-3, pts1), nirattā → nirattaṃ (s1-3, pts1)
mnd14:60.2: akittayi parikittayi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānimakāsi pakāsesīti akittayi → akittayīti kittitaṃ ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaṭaṃ vibhattaṃ uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti-- akittayi (bj, mr)

mnd14:64.4: atthi jānitabbaṃ → atthi dhammaṃ jānitabbaṃ (bj, pts1, mr), sabbaṃ taṃ → sabbantaṃ (s1-3, pts1)

mnd14:104.2: kumbhathūṇaṃ → kumbhathūnaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr), sobhanakaṃ → sobhanagarakaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1), mahiṃsayuddhaṃ → mahisayuddhaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1)
